issues.title: Multi-tenant auth & RBAC
issues.body:
### Acceptance Criteria
- [ ] DB: `tenants`, `users`, `memberships` tables and `tenant_id` on project tables
- [ ] API: `current_user` dependency and `require_role` guards scoping by `tenant_id`
- [ ] Auth: JWT sign/verify, login route returns tenant-scoped token
- [ ] UI: `/login` page, tenant picker, user/role admin, 403 handling
- [ ] Docs/Tests: Auth & Tenancy guide and smoke tests

issues.title: Estimator 1.0: catalog and carrier XML export
issues.body:
### Acceptance Criteria
- [ ] DB: `materials`, `labor_rates`, `assemblies`, `estimates` and item tables with seed data
- [ ] Math: line totals → subtotal → tax → OH&P → grand total
- [ ] Export: deterministic XML with line items and totals
- [ ] UI: catalog manager and Build Estimate flow
- [ ] Docs/Tests: sample catalog, XML schema note, unit tests

issues.title: Incentive rules DSL and finance metrics
issues.body:
### Acceptance Criteria
- [ ] DSL: YAML/TOML rules with eligibility, amount, caps, stacking
- [ ] Engine: deterministic stack order and conflict resolution
- [ ] Finance: IRR/NPV/LCOE endpoints with CSV/PDF report
- [ ] UI: incentive summary panel and downloadable report
- [ ] Docs/Tests: example rules for GA/FL and federal, unit tests

issues.title: ESG sustainability layer
issues.body:
### Acceptance Criteria
- [ ] DB: esg_rules, esg_assessments, esg_reports tables with sample programs
- [ ] API: /api/esg/assess, /credits, /energystar, /report endpoints
- [ ] UI: dashboard ESG tab with scorecard, credits, report download
- [ ] Docs/Tests: ESG guide and stub tests
